entry.title: WIND WARNING, Edmonton (Int'l Aprt)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Int'l Airport 8:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over southern sections late this evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near noon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
